common.iasiExhibitionCenter: Parcarea Casei De Cultura a Studentilor
common.venueDescription: The venue features state-of-the-art sound systems, LED screens, comfortable seating areas, and plenty of space for food vendors, merchandise stands, and interactive installations.

hero.title: ROCK'N'
hero.subtitle: The biggest rock festival in Eastern Europe. Three days of pure rock energy, amazing performances, and unforgettable memories.
hero.location: Parcarea Casei De Cultura a Studentilor, Iasi

about.title: About the Festival
about.subtitle: Rock'n'Iasi is more than just a music festival
about.description: Since its inception, Rock'n'Iasi has been the premier destination for rock music enthusiasts in Eastern Europe. Our festival brings together legendary artists and emerging talents on multiple stages, creating an unforgettable experience for thousands of rock fans.

artists.description: World-class rock bands and solo artists from around the globe

capacity.description: Join thousands of rock enthusiasts for an unforgettable experience

stages.description: Multiple stages with different vibes and musical styles

years.description: Recognized as the best rock festival in Eastern Europe

experience.title: The Ultimate Rock Experience
experience.description1: Set against the beautiful backdrop of Iasi, Romania's cultural capital, the festival offers not just incredible music, but also amazing food, art installations, and interactive experiences that make every moment memorable.

lineup.title: Artist Lineup
lineup.subtitle: Meet the incredible artists that will rock the stage

schedule.title: Festival Schedule
schedule.subtitle: Three days of non-stop rock music

sponsors.title: Become a Sponsor
sponsors.subtitle: Partner with us to make Rock'n'Iași unforgettable

bronze.name: Bronze Partner
bronze.description: Perfect for local businesses looking to support the community

silver.name: Silver Partner
silver.description: Ideal for growing companies seeking regional exposure

gold.name: Gold Partner
gold.description: Premium partnership with maximum brand visibility

stats.brandAlign: Align with Romania's top rock event

venue.title: Festival Venue
venue.subtitle: Located in the heart of Iasi
venue.description: The festival takes place at Parcarea Casei De Cultura a Studentilor, offering multiple stages, food courts, camping areas, and easy access to the city center.

car.title: By Car
car.details: Follow signs to Rock'n'Iasi Festival parking

train.title: By Train
train.details: Regular trains from Bucharest, Cluj, and Timisoara

contact.title: Get in Touch
contact.subtitle: Have questions? We're here to help!

footer.description: Rock'n'Iasi - The ultimate rock festival experience in Eastern Europe.
